ValidationRule.description: Premium Field cannot be below the Rated Premium (allow $2 gap for rounding)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$Setup.Master_Validation__c.Account_Active__c && NOT(Contains(CreatedBy.Profile.Name, 'Admin'))&& OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Received', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Locked', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Open') &&
AND( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Received"), Policy_Period_Days__c = 365, Override__c = false, OR( Premium__c - 2 > Rated_Premium_New__c , Premium__c + 2 < Rated_Premium_New__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Premium cannot be different than the rated premium (excluding rounding)
